name: Morty Mercenaries
description: Renames all mercenaries to Morty, uses "Evil Morty" icon (sprite) & uses Morty's voice for dying, getting hit, giving gear & giving potions. "I can't use that" & "I can't use that yet" are default.
author: Caedendi, Caleb and Friends

config.name: Replace Sprites
config.description: Replace the mercenary's portrait sprite with Evil Morty.

config.name: Replace Sound Effects
config.description: Replace the mercenary's sound effects with Morty's voice ("I can't use that" and "I can't use that yet" are not replaced).

config.name: Mercenary Name
config.description: Use a custom name for your Morty if Rename Mercenary is enabled.
